thread.title: Gina Donaldson
thread.title_full: Outsource Data Recovery reviewed by Gina Donaldson

author: Gina Donaldson
title: Gina Donaldson
text: This was a fabulous service. They fixed my hard drive for a fraction of what it would cost with the manufacturer. Their Quote: and their work was a very quick turn around. They were available for questions before and after they completed the work. Very impressive service!
